[source,bash]
----
$ curl 'http://localhost:8080/services/rest/validation/validateSignature' -i -X POST \
    -H 'Accept: application/json' \
    -H 'Content-Type: application/json; charset=UTF-8' \
    -d '{
  "signedDocument" : {
    "bytes" : "",
    "name" : "xades-detached.xml",
    "absolutePath" : "RemoteDocument",
    "mimeType" : {
      "mimeTypeString" : "text/xml"
    }
  },
  "originalDocument" : {
    "bytes" : "PGhlbGxvPndvcmxkPC9oZWxsbz4=",
    "name" : "sample.xml",
    "absolutePath" : "RemoteDocument",
    "mimeType" : {
      "mimeTypeString" : "text/xml"
    }
  },
  "policy" : null
}'
----
